solution_line_template: The total capacity of the {num_chairs} chairs was {num_chairs}*{chair_capacity}=<<{num_chairs}*{chair_capacity}={total_capacity}>>{total_capacity} people.

If {unoccupied_fraction} of the chairs were unoccupied, {unoccupied_fraction}*{total_capacity}=<<{unoccupied_fraction}*{total_capacity}={missed_members}>>{missed_members} people missed the board meeting since the number of members was the same as the chair's capacity.
The number of board members who attended the meeting was {total_capacity}-{missed_members}=<<{total_capacity}-{missed_members}={attended_members}>>{attended_members}
